text: A layover is a point where a vehicle stops, with passengers possibly changing vehicle. Layover may also refer to: *Layover (novel), a 1999 novel by Lisa Zeidner * The Layover (TV series), an American travel and food show *The Layover EP, a 2008 hip-hop EP by Evidence *The Layover (film), a 2017 film directed by William H. Macy *Layover, alternative title for the 2012 tele- movie Abducted with Lauren Holly ==See also== * Overlay (disambiguation) * Over (disambiguation) * Lay (disambiguation) *
title: Layover (disambiguation)
